title: Week 16 Recap with Daniel Jeremiah + Kyle Rudolph Interview
itunes:title: Week 16 Recap with Daniel Jeremiah + Kyle Rudolph Interview
description:
Shek is joined by NFL Media’s Daniel Jeremiah to discuss the top storylines out of week 16 (1:20) & how he would rate this rookie QB class by “win, place, show” based on projecting their future (11:30). Then, producer Kent Brown joins the show to talk about the Steelers loss to the Saints and what lies ahead for the black & gold (16:00), plus the guys predict which teams will emerge from the AFC & NFC to get to the Super Bowl (32:30). Vikings tight end Kyle Rudolph joins Shek to discuss his nomination for Walter Payton Man of the Year, his team’s season and if his Notre Dame Fighting Irish will beat Clemson in the Cotton Bowl this weekend (44:05).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
